channel.title: Technology Impact on Blowfish
channel.description: Recent content in Technology Impact on Blowfish

item.title: All About AI Hype
item.author: nuno@n9o.xyz (Blowfish)
item.description:
All About AI Hype

Artificial Intelligence (AI) is a buzzword that has permeated almost every aspect of modern life. From the way we work and communicate to how we manage our environment and interact with animals, AI’s impact is being felt far and wide. But how deep is this impact, really? Is it truly revolutionary, or is it just another over-hyped trend that will fade with time?

item.title: The Interconnectedness of Life and Data
item.author: nuno@n9o.xyz (Blowfish)
item.description:
The Interconnectedness of Life and Data

Introduction

While reading below keep your mind open. If you can keep your religious or even scientific information aside it would help you understand my thoughts. For many of you these may be hard ideas to digest, therefore reading multiple times and thinking over again and again will help.

item.title: Will AI Replace Human?
item.author: nuno@n9o.xyz (Blowfish)
item.description:
Artificial Intelligence can Replace Human?

The Success of ChatGPT has taken the world by storm. Unless you are not living in some cave you already know what is happening. People are asking questions like will AI replace humans? What will happen to our jobs? What are the challenges? I thought let me write my thought on this. There was significant overlap between these phases, so don’t assume that when one phase was over then only the second started.
